downloadTitle: System Center 2012 Management Pack for Windows Deployment Services
downloadDescription: ​The Windows Deployment Services Management Pack includes monitors, rules, views, tasks and knowledge for the monitoring of your Windows Deployment Services infrastructure for Windows Server 2012.

downloadFile.name: System Center Monitoring Pack for WDS.msi

detailsSection:
​The Windows Deployment Services Management Pack includes monitors, rules, views, tasks and knowledge for the monitoring of your Windows Deployment Services infrastructure for Windows Server 2012.

Feature Summary
  • Windows Server 2012 Support
  • Service Health Monitoring
  • State and Alert Views
  • Performance Monitoring
  • Alert Knowledge Base Information

Release History
  • 2/27/2013 - Initial English release, version 7.0.8560.0
detailsSection_file_name: System Center Monitoring Pack for WDS.msi
systemRequirementsSection:
• Other Software:
    • Windows Server 2012 with Windows Deployment Services Role
    • System Center 2012 - Operations Manager
installInstructionSection: ​Please refer to WDS 2012 MP Guide for instructions.
